item.title: Tom Hiddleston's Loki Returns To Battle Robert Downey Jr.'s Doctor Doom In Stunning Avengers: Doomsday Art
item.description: Tom Hiddleston's Loki makes his return to the MCU franchise to take on Robert Downey Jr.'s version of Doctor Doom in haunting Avengers: Doomsday art.

item.title: Studio Ghibli Has Lots of Great Movies, But New Data Reveals Its One True Masterpiece
item.description: New new fan poll reveals the true fan-favorite Studio Ghibli movie and it may come as a shock to longtime anime watchers.

item.title: Matthew Lillard's Scream 7 Return Gets Enthusiastic Response From Fellow Ghostface Actor: "I Was So Ecstatic"
item.description: Matthew Lillard's original Ghostface partner, Skeet Ulrich, shares his enthusiasm for the actor's forthcoming franchise return in Scream 7.
